column5: Pending World-Record Redear Sunfish Caught - Wired2Fish.com
OMG 6.3 pounds, 17-inch, live nightcrawler on a drop shot rig. I cannot imagine his reaction
It would be like reeling a turkey platter!!!! TugTug Tug! HH

https://ftw.usatoday.com/2021/05/lake-havasu-yields-another-redear-sunfish-of-world-record-size Another article on the same fish, looks like they might be able to reduce the zebra and quagga mussel problem in the great lakes?
Find it hilarious that he still needs to hold the thing at arms length to make it look big!

Weve caught a few (shellcrackers as they call them in the south)Â down in South Carolina. My buddy dave ended up hooking into a 3 1/2lber and he said it was one of the craziest fights of his life. It fought like a sunny but was a big saucer. wild
